Text.Page:
You're a sight for sore eyes. I'm drowning in work!

You want to make a little extra money?"You know it."
Great! {@LinkCreature:63#3002#Taratia} has a long list of simple tasks that need doingâ€”well, as simple as anything is with her.

Ah, perfect timing! Can you go on a little gathering mission for me?

Elthienne will have my horny head if I don't get some things checked off this list.

This is immensely helpful. You're so amazing. I totally want to be you when I grow up. Seriously!

Tell {@LinkCreature:63#3003#Elthienne} what I said. Not that she'll believe it. She thinks I'm a total screw up.

Sylva fiber? Sylva fiber, where are you? Sylva fiber? Anyone?

No? Darn. I guess I'll just stand around and see if any shows up.

Yes! This is the stuff. You're the best!

{@LinkCreature:63#3003#Elthienne} has something for you. I bet you can't guess what it is!
Your reward, as promised. And a well-deserved one at that. I know working with Taratia can be...stressful.
